de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.job

Interface IJob<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IProjectJob<T>, IRunner<T>, IStoppableJob
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJob, AJob, AStoppableJob, AWorkerThreadJob, LongRunningJob, LongRunningThread

    public interface IJob<T>
    Interface for all jobs.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter, Marcus Pinnecke (Feature Interface)
